meanings.sent1: The disbenefits of eating too much candy include tooth decay.
meanings.sent2: One of the disbenefits of staying up late is feeling tired the next day.
meanings.sent3: She realized the disbenefits of procrastination when she failed to finish her project on time.
meanings.sent4: The disbenefits of neglecting exercise can sneak up on you like a shadow in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The disbenefits of not wearing sunscreen became painfully clear after a day at the beach.

meanings.sent1: The disbenefits of skipping breakfast can lead to low energy levels.
meanings.sent2: He experienced the disbenefits of not saving money when an unexpected expense arose.
meanings.sent3: The disbenefits of forgetting your umbrella on a rainy day are quite evident.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the disbenefits of poor time management is like inviting chaos into your life.
meanings.sent5: The disbenefits of not following instructions were clearly outlined in the manual.
